sectionInstructions: Combine the flour and Greek yogurt together to form the dough
Use your hands to mix/knead the dough then divide dough into 6-8 balls, rest for 15 minutes
Flour your work surface and roll out each ball of dough
Heat a pan on med high heat and cook flatbread for 1-2 minutes on each side until golden and starts to puff up
Brush each flatbread with olive oil, salt & parsley & enjoy
